title: Addressing The Porn Star Controversy
itunes:author: Joe Vulpis & Ilya Feddy
itunes:summary:
Our video studio is finally ready, revealing his birthday present, going to a gay bar, deleting private messages, and the age old debate of standing vs sitting while you pee. This episode is fully loaded, sit back, relax, enjoy
